name: Ultimate Dinosaur Simulator 3D
description:
Are you a fan of dinosaur games? Do you want to embark on a dinosaur safari while testing your gaming skill? Download Ultimate Dinosaur Simulator 3D and play this dino simulator in a realistic Jurrasic world environment. On this dinosaur island’s road, you will meet Trex, Pterodactyl and many other extinct dinos. You should also avoid many obstacles on your way to and keep on moving. See how far you can go in this highly realistic dino endless runner game. Play without interruption or ads. No worry about in app purchasing because by purchasing this app, you already have the complete game.
Ultimate Dinosaur Simulator 3D is an engaging endless runner game where you have to avoid obstacles, hunters, and other dinos while you keep on moving. You play as a dino exploring the Jurrasic world on your own and try to survive for as long as you can. Surviving in jurrasic era is certainly challenging. While playing, you can enjoy seeing the now extinct dinosaurs such as Trex, raptor, and pterodactyl and listen to the dinosaur sounds.
If you are parents looking for dinosaur games for kids, you come to the right place. There are many kids dinosaur games, but most of them have ads that disturbs the gaming experience or allow your kids to accidentally purchase something via in app purchase options. With very little investment you can feel save letting your kids play this kids dinosaur games on their own.

********************************************************
Ultimate Dinosaur Simulator 3D Top Features:
********************************************************
• Play as a dinosaur exploring the dinosaur era in this awesome first person endless runner game.
• Realistic 3D graphic that will immerse you in the Jurassic world.
• Listen to the awesome dinosaur sounds when you explore the map.
• Play as long as you want without interruption from ads.
• No in app purchase.
• Easy game control but difficult to master. We create an easy control system so controlling your dino does not take a lot of effort. However, mastering running and avoiding dangers is another matter entirely!
• Avoid hunters, obstacles, dangers, and other dinos in this dino simulator game.
• Updates. We are constantly fixing bugs and errors within our game as well as improving your gaming experience.
If your kids are looking for kids dinosaur games, you can download this game for them. This dino simulator app will allow them to embark on a dinosaur safari. They can see the now extinct dinos and they can also learn about the environment in that era while enjoy playing this dinosaur simulator. There are not many dinosaur games for kids that are realistic and not too cartoonish and our game will provide a refreshing change for them.
For other gamers, this is a new twist of the endless runner games that are so popular these days. Run as a raptor as far as you can. Your agility and reflex is tested to the max in this game. Don’t be frustrated if you can’t get high score within the first few tries. You just need practice to be able to control your raptor better. Don’t let it run into dangerous dinos and objects. Trex is very dangerous but stumble on a rock can end your game too. Premature game over is usually because you are avoiding things that look big and dangerous but forget about the smaller obstacles. Patience and practice will help a lot in helping you master this dino simulator game.
Please don’t hesitate to contact us if you encounter any problem with the game. You can contact us through our email address (argcondor@gmail.com). If you like our game, please leave a rating and review to support us!
